title: Neopyter
description: A JupyterLab extension. Integrate JupyterLab and Neovim

mode.title: Neopyter work mode
mode.description: Different work mode determine different methods of communication arcitecture. The `proxy` mode will communicate through jupyter server, while the `direct` mode will communicate directly with nvim

ip.title: IP
ip.description: For `proxy` mode, this is the listening `IP:port` of the jupyter server's tcp server; for `direct` mode, this is `IP:port` of nvim's websocket server
